Props.name: PropsBase
Props.summary:
The base props for the [DayPicker](/api/functions/DayPicker.md) component.

These props are used to change the navigation, the styling and the behavior
of the calendar.

Props.name: PropsMulti
Props.summary: The props for the multi selection mode.

Props.name: PropsRange
Props.summary: The props for the range selection mode.

Props.name: PropsSingle
Props.summary: The props for the single selection mode.

Props.name: DayPickerProps
Props.summary: Defines the props accepted by the DayPicker component.

Formatters.name: Formatters
Formatters.summary: Represent a map of formatters used to render localized content.

Formatters.name: formatCaption
Formatters.summary: The default formatter for the caption element.

Formatters.name: formatDay
Formatters.summary: The default formatter for the day grid cell element.

Formatters.name: formatMonthDropdown
Formatters.summary: The default formatter for the month dropdown value.

Formatters.name: formatWeekNumber
Formatters.summary: The default formatter for the week numbers.

Formatters.name: formatWeekdayName
Formatters.summary: The default formatter for the name of the weekday.

Formatters.name: formatYearDropdown
Formatters.summary: The default formatter for the Year caption.

Labels.name: Labels
Labels.summary: Map of functions returning ARIA labels for the relative elements.

Labels.name: labelDay
Labels.summary: Return the default ARIA label for the day button.

Labels.name: labelMonthDropdown
Labels.summary: Return the default ARIA label for the WeekNumber element.

Labels.name: labelNext
Labels.summary: Return the default ARIA label for next month button.

Labels.name: labelPrevious
Labels.summary: Return the default ARIA label for next month button.

Labels.name: labelWeekNumber
Labels.summary: Return the default ARIA label for the week number element.

Labels.name: labelWeekNumberHeader
Labels.summary: Return the default ARIA label for the week number header element.

Labels.name: labelWeekday
Labels.summary: Return he default ARIA label for the Weekday element.

Labels.name: labelYearDropdown
Labels.summary: The default ARIA label for the years dropdown.

Classes.name: CalendarDay
Classes.summary: A day displayed in a month grid.

Classes.name: Month
Classes.summary: A month displayed in the month grid. Contains the weeks.

Classes.name: Week
Classes.summary: A week displayed in a month grid. Contains the days.

Contexts.name: CalendarProvider
Contexts.summary: The provider for the `calendarContext`, storing the calendar state.

Contexts.name: DayPickerProvider
Contexts.summary:
The provider for the `dayPickerContext`, storing the props and setting its
defaults. Must be the root of all the providers.

Contexts.name: SelectionProvider
Contexts.summary: The provider for the `selectionContext`, storing the calendar state.

Contexts.name: useCalendar
Contexts.summary:
Use this hook to access to the dates displayed in the calendar and to
navigate between months.

Contexts.name: useDayPicker
Contexts.summary: Use this hook to access to the DayPicker context within Custom Components.

Contexts.name: useSelection
Contexts.summary:
Use this hook to access to the dates displayed in the calendar and to
navigate between months.

Custom Components.name: CustomComponents
Custom Components.summary:
The components that can be changed using the [PropsBase.components](/api/interfaces/PropsBase.md#components)
components prop.

Custom Components.name: Button
Custom Components.summary: The component used to generate the button elements in the calendar.

Custom Components.name: Chevron
Custom Components.summary: Render the chevron icon used in the navigation buttons and dropdowns.

Custom Components.name: DayGridCell
Custom Components.summary: Render the gridcell of a day in the calendar.

Custom Components.name: Dropdown
Custom Components.summary: Render a dropdown component to use in the navigation bar.

Custom Components.name: DropdownNav
Custom Components.summary: Render the dropdowns to navigate between months.

Custom Components.name: MonthCaption
Custom Components.summary: Render the caption of a month in the calendar.

Custom Components.name: MonthGrid
Custom Components.summary:
Render the grid with the weekday header row and the weeks for the given
month.

Custom Components.name: MonthsDropdown
Custom Components.summary: Render the dropdown to change the month.

Custom Components.name: Nav
Custom Components.summary: Render the navigation buttons to change the month.

Custom Components.name: WeekNumberRowHeader
Custom Components.summary: Render the cell with the number of the week.

Custom Components.name: WeekRow
Custom Components.summary: Render a row in the calendar, with the days and the week number.

Custom Components.name: WeekdayColumnHeader
Custom Components.summary: Render the column header with the weekday name (e.g. "Mo", "Tu", etc.)

Custom Components.name: WeekdaysRow
Custom Components.summary: Render the row with the weekday names.

Custom Components.name: YearsDropdown
Custom Components.summary: Render the dropdown to change the year.

Date Matchers.name: DateAfter
Date Matchers.summary:
A matcher to match a day falling after the specified date, with the date not
included.

Date Matchers.name: DateBefore
Date Matchers.summary:
A matcher to match a day falling before the specified date, with the date not
included.

Date Matchers.name: DateInterval
Date Matchers.summary:
A matcher to match a day falling before and/or after two dates, where the
dates are not included.

Date Matchers.name: DateRange
Date Matchers.summary:
A matcher to match a range of dates. The range can be open. Differently from
`DateInterval`, the dates here are included.

Date Matchers.name: DayOfWeek
Date Matchers.summary:
A matcher to match a date being one of the specified days of the week (`0-7`,
where `0` is Sunday).

Date Matchers.name: Matcher
Date Matchers.summary: A value or a function that matches a specific day.

Event Handlers.name: DayFocusEventHandler
Event Handlers.summary: The event handler when a day is focused.

Event Handlers.name: DayKeyboardEventHandler
Event Handlers.summary: The event handler when a day gets a keyboard event.

Event Handlers.name: DayMouseEventHandler
Event Handlers.summary: The event handler when a day gets a mouse event.

Event Handlers.name: DayPointerEventHandler
Event Handlers.summary: The event handler when a day gets a pointer event.

Event Handlers.name: DayTouchEventHandler
Event Handlers.summary: The event handler when a day gets a touch event.

Event Handlers.name: MonthChangeEventHandler
Event Handlers.summary: The event handler when a month is changed in the calendar.

Event Handlers.name: WeekNumberClickEventHandler
Event Handlers.summary: The event handler when the week number is clicked.

Modifiers.name: InternalModifier
Modifiers.summary: The name of the modifiers that are used internally by DayPicker.

Modifiers.name: Modifiers
Modifiers.summary: The modifiers that are matching a day in the calendar.

Modifiers.name: ModifiersClassNames
Modifiers.summary: The classnames to assign to each day element matching a modifier.

Modifiers.name: ModifiersMap
Modifiers.summary: A map of modifiers with the days.

Modifiers.name: ModifiersStyles
Modifiers.summary: The style to apply to each day element matching a modifier.

Selection Modes.name: ModePropsMap
Selection Modes.summary: Map of the props supported by selection modes.

Selection Modes.name: Mode
Selection Modes.summary:
The available selection modes.

Available modes:

- `none`: no selection is allowed.
- `single`: only one day can be selected.
- `multi`: multiple days can be selected.
- `range`: a range of days can be selected.
- `custom`: customize selections via `onDayClick`

Selection Modes.name: SelectHandler
Selection Modes.summary: The callback called when the user select a days from the calendar.

Selection Modes.name: Selected
Selection Modes.summary: The selected value when in selection mode.

Styling.name: DropdownOption
Styling.summary: An option to use in the dropdown. Maps to the `<option>` HTML element.

Deprecated Exports.name: CaptionLayout
Deprecated Exports.summary: Set the layout of the caption.

Deprecated Exports.name: DayClickEventHandler
Deprecated Exports.summary: The event handler when a day is clicked.
